step.cmd: Find the icon of a clipboard on the far left side of OneNote’s Home tab.
Click on the Clipboard to open a dropdown menu that includes Cut, Copy, and Paste.
step.info: Note: You can also access the Clipboard options by pressing Control + Click anywhere on the note page.

step.cmd: To delete an object, click on it then use the “Cut” option from the clipboard. Alternatively, you can cut content by pressing Command + X.
To copy an object, click on it then use the “Copy” option from the clipboard. Alternatively, you can copy content by pressing Command + C.
To paste an object, first copy the object in question, then use the “Paste” option from the clipboard. Alternatively, you can paste content by pressing Command + V.
